original_title: Sri Lankan wins Best Director Award at 22nd Dhaka International Film Festival
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan film director Jagath Manuwarna Kodithuwakku has won the Best Director Award at the 22nd Dhaka International Film Festival, for the movie 'Whispering Mountains'.
Jagath Manuwarna's "Whispering Mountains" has won several international awards in the past as well, including at the 52nd Rotterdam International Film Festival.
